text: Harris Yulin (born November 5, 1937) is an American actor. He is known for his roles in Scarface (1983), Ghostbusters II (1989), Clear and Present Danger (1994), Looking for Richard (1996), The Hurricane (1999), Training Day (2001), and Frasier which earned him a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1996. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Harris Yulin
